General.Name: Global Bioenergies SA
General.Description: Global Bioenergies SA engages in the development of a process for converting plant-based feedstocks into isobutene used in the cosmetic and aviation fuel industry. The company also offers engineering services in gas fermentation process. In addition, it develops a process to convert gaseous carbon sources, such as CO2, CO, and industrial emissions comprising syngas into various chemical compounds. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Evry, France.

1.Name: Mr. Philippe  Marliere
1.Title: Co-Founder & Pres of Scientific Advisory Board
